name: Maud's Mixers Spicy Margarita Cocktail Mix, 14 ct, Mocktail Non-Alcoholic Drinks - Made with Real Agave - Low Calorie, Low Sugar, Easy to Mix
short_description: The perfect Spicy Margarita, ready in seconds! Enjoy a bold twist on the classic margarita – Simply dissolve one spicy margarita mix packet in water, add tequila, or skip the alcohol for a refreshingly spicy mocktail.

Low Sugar, Low Calorie, Full Flavor and No Guilt! With only 20 calories per serving, this perfectly balanced blend of zesty lime, a hint of orange, and a kick of chili spice delivers a fiery margarita — without the extra sugar or carbs.
The Ultimate Party Essential - Effortlessly mix up delicious Spicy Margaritas for friends and family. Whether it’s a casual get-together or a big celebration, Maud’s Mixers make entertaining easy!
Cocktails or Mocktails, Anytime, Anywhere - No blender or shaker needed. Maud’s Mixers let you create the perfect drink, no matter where you are.

Disclaimer: We use real ingredients—no shortcuts here. When mixed with cold water, some of the natural bits may not dissolve all the way. It’s a sign of authenticity, not a flaw. For a smoother mix, use room-temp liquids and stir or shake well before pouring over ice.

name: SINGLES TO GO! Margaritaville Water Drink Mix, Variety Pack, Includes 4 Flavors: Caribbean Fruit Punch, Pina Colada, Strawberry Daiquiri, And Margarita,1 Box (40 Single Servings)
short_description: MARGARITAVILLE SINGLES TO GO –Now you can bring the taste of the Margarita with you anywhere, anytime Margaritaville Singles To Go drink mix sticks are bursting with Non-Alcoholic, Margarita Flavoredthat will add tasty excitement to your water.
VARIETY PACK –With 40 sticks included, you’ll get a taste of 4 different Margarita flavors including Caribbean Fruit Punch, Pina Colada, Strawberry Daiquiri and Margarita.
CONVENIENT –With these conveniently packaged single drink mix sticks, you can take the great taste of Margaritaville with you anywhere you go
JUST ADD WATER –Sip from a full bottle of water to make room for powder. Pour one stick into a 16.9 fl. oz. bottle or large glass of water, shake or stir until well mixed, and enjoy
WATERTOK –Mix and match Singles To Go flavors to create your ultimate WaterTok recipes and favorites
product_description: Need a getaway from a stressful day at the office? How about a ten-minute time-out from the kids? Margaritaville Singles To Go drink mix is the perfect stress reliever. Get the delicious taste of a margarita. Have a second – or a third – because this tasty drink mix treat is low in calories and contains no caffeine.Pour the flavor stick into a bottle of water and shake to mix, and you’re ready to be transported from your desk to a beach. Margaritaville Singles To Go are a great option to keep stocked for guests too – providing a more fun and interesting beverage than just plain water.Order your pack of 12 boxes, each containing 6 flavor packets, and make sure your kitchen is stocked today.

name: Mingle Mocktails - Blackberry Hibiscus Bellini, Cranberry Cosmo, Key Lime Margarita, Blood Orange Elderflower Mimosa, Cucumber Melon Mojito, Sparkling Raspberry Rose, Variety Pack, Premium Non Alcoholic Cocktails,12 FL OZ Cans (24 Pack Cans)
short_description: CELEBRATE YOUR SPIRIT: Experience a diverse array of non-alcoholic mocktails that let you celebrate your choices, whether abstaining for a day, week, or forever. This variety pack fosters inclusion, social connection, and fun, embracing everyone, drinkers and non-drinkers alike.

DELICIOUS FLAVORS: Indulge in the delicious fusion of flavors with our variety pack. From the tangy sophistication of Cranberry Cosmo to the invigorating zing of Cucumber Melon Mojito, each bottle offers a unique and delicious experience without compromising on taste.

FLEXIBLY MIXABLE: Enjoy the flexibility of creating your own unique mocktail experiences. Whether you prefer the crisp effervescence of Key Lime Margarita or the delightful blend of Blackberry Hibiscus Bellini, these mocktails are not only enjoyable on their own but also perfect for crafting your customized light cocktails.

CLEAN CRAFTED INDULGENCE: Mingle Mocktails variety pack brings you a selection of clean-crafted sparkling mocktails made with real botanicals, fruit juices, and 100% pure organic cane sugar. Savor guilt-free indulgence with low-calorie, gluten-free, and vegan alternatives that redefine the art of celebration.

VERSATILE CELEBRATION PACK: Redefine your celebrations with Mingle Mocktails' Variety Pack. Whether you're hosting a party, enjoying 'me-time,' or toasting with friends, this pack offers a versatile range of flavors, ensuring everyone at the gathering can partake in the ultimate guilt-free, flavorful, and clean-crafted celebration.

name: Modica Bluberry Lavender Lemon Drop - Premium Non-Alcoholic Cocktail & Mocktail Mixer (10 Servings) Created by Award-Winning Mixologist
short_description: BETTER TASTING: Elevate your cocktail or mocktail with this fruity, juicy, and floral mixer. Blueberry and lavender elevate the classic lemon drop to one that's more modern and better for you!
MIXOLOGIST CRAFTED: Created by an award-winning mixologist with 15 years of experience, Modica makes cocktails and mocktails that taste like your favorite bartender made them!
CALORIE & SUGAR SAVER: Each serving of Modica boasts a mere 35 calories, using 70% less sugar compared to competitors with a whopping 46g of sugar and 190 calories. Plus, it's alcohol-free!
AWARD-WINNING: Modica is a proud recipient of multiple medals and awards, including Product of the Year from Food & Beverage Magazine.

MAKES 10 DRINKS: Each Modica bottle crafts 10 cocktails effortlessly. Just add ice and mix 1.5oz Modica with 1.5oz of your choice of spirits, or club soda for a nonalcoholic mocktail. No fuss, no extra ingredients—just pure mixology magic. Explore more recipes on our website!

name: Craftmix Lemonade Variety Mix, 12 Packets, Easy Powder Drink with Real Fruit, Low-Sugar, Vegan, Low-Carb, Non-GMO, Dairy-Free, Gluten-Free, Flavored Water Enhancer, On-the-Go Water Flavoring Packets
short_description: The Easiest Lemonade Ever: Craftmix Lemonade Variety Mix including Blueberry, Pink, and Classic Lemonade, is a refreshingly simple drink mix. With no blending or prep required, each sip transports you to a sunny, tropical escape—just add water and enjoy

Guilt-Free, Low-Calorie Indulgence: Enjoy lemonade without the extra sugar or calories. This light lemonade mix is low-carb, low-sugar, and made with real lemons. Each packet contains only 25 calories and is vegan, gluten-free, soy-free, and dairy-free.

3 Steps to Fresh Lemonade: Making your perfect glass of lemonade is easier than ever. Just mix one packet into still or sparkling water, stir, and pour over ice. That’s it! No mess, no hassle—just vibrant flavor in every sip.

A Perfect Water Enhancer: Whether you’re staying hydrated at work, the gym, or on the go, Craftmix is your new favorite water upgrade. Compact and portable, each packet transforms plain water into a delicious citrus treat—anytime, anywhere.

Delicious Lemonade Anywhere You Go: Pre-measured for convenience, these lemonade mix packets are perfect for school, picnics, camping, BBQs, or a quick refresher after a long day. Keep them in your bag, car, or kitchen drawer for a burst of sunshine in seconds.

name: TRIP Lightly Sparkling Adaptogen Seltzer, Non-Alcoholic Mocktail with Magnesium, Ashwagandha, Lions Mane & L Theanine, No Added Sugar, Vegan, Original Variety Pack, 12 Oz, 12Pk
short_description: REFRESHING LIGHTLY SPARKLING ADAPTOGEN DRINK: Experience a refreshingly sophisticated sparkling mocktail beverage made with a blend of carefully selected botanicals and adaptogens, including Lion's Mane, Ashwagandha, and L-theanine. Perfectly balanced to offer a unique flavor profile, TRIP is sociable and can be enjoyed anytime, solo as an alcohol alternative or mixed into cocktails!

NATURALLY INFUSED WITH BOTANICALS: Trip Mindful Blend is crafted with nature's finest ingredients, combining magnesium drink benefits with carefully selected botanicals and adaptogens. These thoughtfully chosen ingredients create a delicious non-alcoholic beverage designed to support your body's natural rhythms, helping you reset, rebalance, and recalibrate*. Enjoy this drink to stay refreshed and productive without the usual drawbacks of fatigue or loss of focus*.

LOW CALORIE, NO ADDED SUGAR: With only 25 calories per can and no added sugars, Trip Mindful Blend offers a guilt-free indulgence. This lightly sparkling, non-alcoholic drink mocktails option (0% ABV) is perfect for those who want to enjoy a delicious beverage without compromising their dietary goals.

SUITABLE FOR VARIOUS DIETARY PREFERENCES: Made in America, Trip Mindful Blend is gluten free, palm oil free, vegan, and non GMO adaptogen soda, making it suitable for a variety of dietary lifestyles. Enjoy this sparkling drink knowing it's made with care and attention to the ingredients you value most.

GREAT TASTING AWARD-WINNING FLAVORS: Winner of the Great Taste Award three years in a row, Trip Mindful Blend seltzer offers a satisfying and sophisticated flavor experience. Enjoy a variety of refreshing options, including Melon Cucumber, Raspberry Blossom, Elderflower Mint, and Peach Ginger. Each flavor is carefully crafted with botanical extracts and designed to delight your taste buds with every sip, offering a unique and memorable drinking experience.
*This statement has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

name: SAYSO Variety Pack | Skinny Mix Includes Spicy Margarita, Cardamom Paloma, Hibiscus Cosmopolitan & Honey Rosemary Moscow Mule Craft Cocktail & Moctkail Mixers (Low-Calorie & Low Sugar), 8-Pack Assorted
short_description: ALL-NATURAL INGREDIENTS: No preservatives, artificial colors, flavors or allergens.

PREMIUM, FULL FLAVOR TASTE: Unlike tea, SAYSO makes full-flavor drinks. Water and spirits rehydrate our powdered and granulated ingredients into juices. Plus, our blend of fresh-dried ingredients gives each drink a nuanced, well-balanced flavor, unlike pre-made mixes.
LOW SUGAR AND CALORIES: Our tea bags contain between 0-35 calories per bag and 0-8g of sugar. This is 1/4 of the calorie and sugar content in the average canned cocktail.

NO HOT WATER REQUIRED: Use room temperature water and spirits. Our powdered and granulated ingredients deliver a near-instant infusion, even in cold water. The larger pieces of dehydrated fruits, herbs and spices will add nuance to the drink as you enjoy it.
COCKTAIL OR MOCKTAIL: Enjoy as a cocktail or omit the spirits and enjoy alcohol-free.

Versatile Sweet Cocktail Mixer – Perfect drink mixers for cocktails and non-alcoholic drinks. Elevate Manhattans, daiquiris, or create signature mocktails. Also works as flavored syrups for drinks, ice cream, and dessert applications.

short_description: PERFECT ALCOHOL-FREE ALTERNATIVE: Recess Mocktails are the perfect alcohol alternative to enjoy while you’re socializing or unwinding at the end of the day.
NO HANGOVER: The 12-pack Happy Hour Sampler has 3 of each flavor: Classic “Cosmo”, Island “Spritz,” Lime "Margarita,” and Grapefruit "Paloma.”

MOCKTAIL WITH BENEFITS: Our mocktails are infused with uplifting guayusa and balancing adaptogens to keep you in the moment while socializing or unwinding at the end of the day.

BALANCED BOOST: Contains 10mg of naturally occurring caffeine from guayusa for socializing, less than half the caffeine in a cup of tea or soda.
